summary: Build a simple React user details form that accepts user input and validates required fields as a foundation for future expansion.

existing_features.title: Create a new frontend page/screen that contains a simple "User Details" form implemented in React + TypeScript, with common user fields (at minimum: First name, Last name, Email) and a primary submit button.
Implement required-field validation for the User Details form, including inline error messages and blocking submission until all required fields are valid.

Apply a coherent visual theme across the form screen (typography, spacing, button and input styles) using Tailwind and existing UI components, ensuring consistent layout and accessibility (labels, focus states, and error styling).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple React user details form with input fields and required-field validation

architectural_notes: Use React for UI; implement basic client-side validation for required fields (optionally with TypeScript).
projectName: Create a simple User Details form with required-field validation (React + TypeScript)
